[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@sym20/core-conversations](./core-conversations.md) &gt; [IConversationStore](./core-conversations.iconversationstore.md) &gt; [createRoom](./core-conversations.iconversationstore.createroom.md)

## IConversationStore.createRoom() method

Create a new room

The initial members will be the current user and all users given in the `members` aegument.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createRoom(name: string, description: string, members: UserId[], settings: Partial<IRoomSettingsCreate>): Promise<IConversationRoom>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | <code>string</code> | Name of the new conversation |
|  description | <code>string</code> | Description of the conversation |
|  members | <code>UserId[]</code> | Initial members of the conversation |
|  settings | <code>Partial&lt;IRoomSettingsCreate&gt;</code> | Initial settings of the conversation. Any setting that is not included will have default values. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<IConversationRoom>`

The created conversation
